item.title: Reverse Words in a String III
item.description: 557. Reverse Words in a String III 題目 只反轉句子裡面的單字，而不改變單字的順序。 範例 Input: s = "Let's take LeetCode contest" Output: "s'teL ekat edoCteeL tsetnoc" Input: s = "God Ding" Output: "doG gniD" 解答 public class Solution { public string ReverseWords(string s) { string[] subs = s.Split(" "); for (int i = 0; i < subs.Length; i++) { subs[i] = new string(subs[i].Reverse().ToArray()); } return String.Join(" ", subs); } } 解題思路 先將句子切割成一個個單字的矩陣，再分別把每個單字做轉換，最後再合併成一個字串。

item.title: Reverse String
